duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage Systems Engineering Managers to support Systems Engineers in driving growth within Commercial Accounts.
Drive enterprise-wide sales-related initiatives and achieve revenue generation and quota targets.
Interact with customers and partners to provide valuable insights into industry trends, technical evolutions, and business changes.
Develop outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives to drive pipeline and sales, and lead portfolio expansion initiatives.
Ensure effective account planning, develop deep relationships, and lead successful evaluations and return of equipment.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams, such as Support, Finance, HR, and Product Management.
Act as an escalation point for technical issues, mentor reporting sales engineers, and manage successful evaluations.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 8 years experience in first and/or second-line Systems Engineering management. Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's preferred).
